channel.title: Special attack
channel.description:
For some reason on my server special attack isn't working anymore it used to work fine but after awhile I been doing updates and such and I have no idea what update effected it... when you do the spec it takes the amount for the spec but doesn't attack or display the animation nor emote for the attack and this comes up in the server .bat file.
[IMG]http://i1091.photobucket.com/albums/i384/algadonsupport/errorspec.gif[/img]
I looked in the files for incorrect arrays and they all seem to be correct..

item.title: Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

For some reason on my server special attack isn’t working anymore it used to work fine but after awhile I been doing updates and such and I have no idea what update effected it… when you do the spec it takes the amount for the spec but doesn’t attack or display the animation nor emote for the attack and this comes up in the server .bat file.

I looked in the files for incorrect arrays and they all seem to be correct…
